text: Justina Valentine (born February 14, 1987) is an American rapper, singer, songwriter and television personality from Passaic County, New Jersey, best known for her singles "Candy Land" In 2016, Valentine became a cast member of season 8 of Wild 'N Out on MTV (later VH1) and has been a member of the cast for every successive season since. As of season 17, she is the longest running female cast member to star on the show. == Musical style and influences == Valentine's eclectic music style infuses hip hop with elements of other genres. She has had charting singles and regular radio airplay. == Discography == Albums *Scarlet Letter (2016) * Favorite Vibe (2019) * Infrared (2020) EPs * Valentine (2013) Mixtapes * Route 80 (2012) * Red Velvet (2014) * Feminem (2017) ==References== Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:American rappers Category:American hip hop singers Category:American R&B; singers Category:American soul singers Category:American blue-eyed soul singers Category:American trap musicians Category:American singer-songwriters Category:Singers from New Jersey
title: Justina Valentine
